text: :raising_hand: Roll call! Who else is here?

Why are we doing a roll call?

There are thousands of people in this channel.

If wondering why messages were slow, it was a U.S. holiday yesterday and the majority of U.S. folks would not have been working that day.
I’d also kind of assume for the next 3ish hours it will likely be slow still as people are getting in to work and coming back with that “What was I working on Friday?” fog.

Hello everyone,

I have a question about HubSpot basic cookies. Is it possible to have cross portal management?

Thanks,
I have two HubSpot portals that host two different websites and I would like that if a user accepts cookies on my first site then they accept for my second site.

Hi everyone! Is it possible to have our own web app talk to HubSpot? For example, we can set certain triggers on our end, and if they're activated, HubSpot can generate notifications or a to-do action item for a sales rep / account manager? To be more specific, if certain clients aren't utilizing our app enough, can we have it link to HubSpot?

Hi Seth! Hope you’re well and excellent gif choice — though I’m sorry for the lack of reply. I’m happy to help out however I can :slightly_smiling_face: Here are some starting off points, though they may already be on your radar/too introductory:
• <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/chatflows/create-a-bot|Create a bot>: There are several templates available to you with some standard bots -- bots to book meetings, create tickets, etc. You can start building off of one of these, or start from scratch.
• <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/conversations/a-guide-to-bot-actions|Choose bot actions>: This resource outlines the various bot actions you can add 
• HubSpot Academy chat bot <https://academy.HubSpot.com/lessons/chatbots-in-HubSpot|lesson>
• <https://blog.HubSpot.com/customers/creating-a-chatbot-strategy|Here> is a HubSpot blog post about creating a chatbot strategy -- it includes some good examples and best practices
• A <https://blog.HubSpot.com/marketing/chatbots-improve-customer-experience-experiment|case study> from HubSpot’s chatbot strategies
Like I said, these may be more appropriate for just getting started, rather than improving an existing bot, so let me know where your focus is for the moment. I’m happy to _chat_ (heh) further too if there are improvements, iterations, ideas, etc that you’d like to bounce around. Sounds like we may need to create a chat channel here :thinking_face:
<@UDPJ43B39> always swoopn in saving my life in community and slack! Thank you, lots of great resources and so glad to see the chatflows channel!
